title: Daniel Birt's DEADLY GAME aka THIRD PARTY RISK (1954) movie trailer

sources.title: Daniel Birt's DEADLY GAME aka THIRD PARTY RISK (1954) movie trailer
sources.description: One of the early 1950s Hammer "films noirs", a couple of years before Scifi and Horror made their break in the English studios. Young Lloyd Bridges stars. more info on http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0048715/
